title: Market tremors signal a structural shift as tech firms confront a faster, leaner future
description: A sharp sell-off in technology stocks following advances in AI systems like Anthropic’s Claude signals deeper market unease about how fast artificial intelligence is reshaping value creation, labour models and business economics—posing both risks and reinvention challenges for Indian IT firms.

title: Israel's FINQ launches US ETFs managed solely by AI
description: Israel fund manager FINQ said on Tuesday it was entering the U.S. Exchange-Traded Funds market with two funds that will be solely managed by artificial intelligence, a nascent sub-sector where so far AI has only been used as a supporting tool.

title: Three reasons India’s economy is stronger than it’s ever been
description: India is entering a new era of opportunity. Strong trade deals with the US, UAE, Britain, and EU are opening global markets. The nation is excelling in advanced manufacturing, particularly in mobile phones and chip design. India is also embracing Artificial Intelligence, becoming a leader in affordable AI services.
